TITLE: Resend my Satellite Radio Signal
SUB_TITLE: Are you near your car or radio?
YES_POINT_ONE: Turn on your radio and set it to Satellite.
YES_POINT_TWO: Make sure the radio has a clear view to the sky (not blocked by a garage, large trees, or buildings). Please Note: The refresh can take up to 15 minutes.
YES_POINT_THREE: Enter your Radio ID, VIN, or phone number.
TEXT_FIELD_PLACEHOLDER: Radio ID, VIN, or Phone Number
FIND_RADIO_ID_HYPERLINK: Don't have a Radio ID (RID) or an Account Number?
NO_INSTRUCTIONS: That’s okay! We’ll text you instructions so you can resend your satellite radio signal once you’re near your radio.
CUSTOMER_AGREEMENT_CHECKBOX_TEXT: I agree to receive a one-time message and certify this is my mobile number. Message and data rates may apply. SMS Terms and Conditions can be viewed at siriusxm.com/sms.
RADIOID_ACCOUNT_NUMBER_LOOKUP: How do I find my Radio ID (RID)?

ERROR.RADIO_ID_INPUT_REQUIRED: Enter a valid phone number, Radio ID or VIN.
ERROR.RADIO_ID_INPUT_FORMAT: Enter a valid phone number, Radio ID or VIN.
ERROR.MOBILE_REQUIRED: Enter a valid mobile phone number.
ERROR.MESSAGE_AGREE_TO_TEXT_MESSAGE: Please confirm that you have read and agree to the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.

NO_POINT_TWO: We’ll send you a one-time text with a link to resend your satellite radio signal.
NO_POINT_THREE: Once you’re near your radio, follow instructions in the text message to resend your satellite signal.
